entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Fog patches dissipating late in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
